CustomField.description: When the Enable Syncing Projects with Jira Issues field is selected, determines the type of Jira issues PSA projects are synced with.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Enable Syncing Projects with Jira Issues field is selected, determines the type of Jira issues PSA projects are synced with. This value is case-sensitive and the issue type must exist in your Jira application.
CustomField.label: Jira Issue Type
